title: E3 STARTS TOMORROW! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.08.18
description:
Visit http://omahasteaks.com and type KFGAMES in the search bar to get this special Father's Day offer.
Tim and Greg are here with the last Games Daily before E3 starts tomorrow with EA Play!

00:02:49 - Housekeeping
 E3 is coming up -- pre-, post-, and live shows for every conference. Then, working from LA.
The Roper Report   -
00:05:45 - Respawn news, Tim Gettys Kinda
00:09:55 - Crackdown in Feb, Jez Corden on Windows Central
00:14:26 - Just Cause 4 Leaked on Steam Ad
00:16:30 - Bad Robot Making Games, Garth Franklin at Dark Horizons
00:17:40 - Generation Zero (From Avalanche) Announced
00:20:19 - Twin Mirror, New Game From DontNod via PS Blog
00:28:26 - Dead or Alive 6 Announced, IGN
00:23:50 - Out today:
 Reader mail   -
00:29:44 - AIDS Simulator was approved and made for sale on Steam and the description literally said "low effort cash-grab."  - Ron Baron
00:38:15 - Should I buy a PSVR now, or wait till next week? - Dan Squiggs
00:42:37 - New mechanics for Pokemon? - Drakkul
00:44:55 - What do you think are the odds Psychonauts 2 will make an appearance at E3? - Colli-B
00:46:10 - Squad Up:Chris (Xbox One) - BLAST0ISE (with a zero)
00:47:25 - One of them rotatin’ segments - Where my wolves at?
00:49:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: No shows next week! E3 craziness!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
